title: Functional Game-Based Training Program for Talent Development in Female Cricket Athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic cricket rules and techniques, with foundational sports science knowledge
context.additional_context: Real-Time Digital Feedback & Analytical Tools Implementation

learning_goals: Improve application accuracy of core cricket skills (bowling, batting, fielding) to at least 85% through functional game scenarios
Evaluate the ability to flexibly apply skills acquired in a gender-integrated training environment to real-game situations
Design personalized talent development roadmaps and set at least three long-term growth goals (3-month/6-month milestones)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
